sentence.Network_cn: 他那副可笑模样使我忍无可忍.

means.word_mean: 1. a message whose content is at variance with reason

auth_sentence.content: It's when Sean embraces an inner ridiculousness that he shines.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's when Sean embraces an inner ridiculousness that he shines.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's when Sean embraces an inner ridiculousness that he shines.

auth_sentence.content: There is no need for the artificial ridiculousness of chess boxing.

auth_sentence.content: We also need to acknowledge the ridiculousness of the random luck explanation.
